Here is how Iamhero affiliate scheme works

Furthermore, we have set up a very simple and very attractive “Invite Friends Program” for everybody. When you register a free account at iamhero.io you will find it in the “Invite Friends” function in your dashboard. We track the referrals on 3 levels and give you IAHC tokens.

Everybody that registers on our site through your referral will receive 500 tokens which are being issued at $5 value equivalent.

Until the first 25 Mio. tokens are issued you will receive:

800 tokens for first tier referrals

300 tokens for second tier referrals

100 tokens for third tier referrals

For the next 25 Mio. tokens being issued you will receive:

800 tokens for first tier referrals

300 tokens for second tier referrals

100 tokens for third tier referrals

For the next 50 Mio. tokens being issued you will receive:

800 tokens for first tier referrals

300 tokens for second tier referrals

100 tokens for third tier referrals

For those that are referring a lot of people directly we have the following increasing token commission structure for first tier referrals:

  • 1 — 5 Refferals

    800 Tokens

  • 6 — 10 Refferals

    800 Tokens

  • 11— 15 Refferals

    800 Tokens

  • 16 — 25 Refferals

    800 Tokens

  • 26 — 50 Refferals

    800 Tokens

  • 51 — 100 Refferals

    800 Tokens

  • 101 — 500 Refferals

    800 Tokens

  • 500+ Refferals

    800 Tokens

Example:

An individual that refers 10 people directly would receive 4000 tokens for the first 5 referred people plus another 4500 for the next set of 5 referred people and so on.

This means that 10 referred people would lead to a total of 8500 tokens which is a $85 commission value in US$ equivalent.
